thread.title: Police: Car plows into parade crowd in New Orleans; 12 hurt
thread.title_full: Police: Car plows into parade crowd in New Orleans; 12 hurt

title: Police: Car plows into parade crowd in New Orleans; 12 hurt
text:
NEW ORLEANS â€“ Twelve people were injured Saturday night when a vehicle plowed into a crowd watching a parade in the Mid-City section of New Orleans, police said. 
The Times-Picayune reports the crash was reported Saturday at about 6:45 p.m. 
New Orleans Police Department spokeswoman Ambria Washington says that "initial reports show so far that about a dozen people are in critical condition." 
She says that number could increase as the investigation continues. 
Emergency personnel tended to the injured as the parade rolled on nearby. 
The Associated Press contributed to this report. Advertisement
